GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
i2c: cadence: Support PEC for SMBus block read

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 353d55ff1bfc90cf1f36de89e8655182d9ae06c8, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit df8eb5691c48d3b03b918bdf065caa59c4281cdc. For more details please see the references link.
